00026 void DzSetupWizard::setAuthor( DzAuthor *author )
00027 {
00028     m_nameEdt->setText( author->getName() );
00029     m_emailEdt->setText( author->getEmail() );
00030     m_urlEdt->setText( author->getUrl() );
00031 }
00032 
00036 DzAuthor *DzSetupWizard::getAuthor() const
00037 {
00038     return new DzAuthor( m_nameEdt->text(), m_emailEdt->text(), m_urlEdt->text() );

00050 
00051 void DzSetupWizard::loadData()
00052 {
00053     int         i, n;
00054     int         curIdx = 0;
00055     QDir        styledir( dzApp->getResourcesPath() + "/style" );
00056     QDir        layoutdir( dzApp->getResourcesPath() + "/layouts" );
00057     QStringList files;
00058     QString     style;
00059     QString     layout;
00060 
00061     comboBox_style->clear();
00062     comboBox_layout->clear();
00063 
00064     files = styledir.entryList( "*.style", QDir::Files );
00065     for( i = 0, n = files.count(); i < n; ++i ){
00066         style = DzFileIO::getBaseFileName( files[i] );
00067         comboBox_style->insertItem( style );
00068     }
00069 
00070     files = layoutdir.entryList( "*.dsx", QDir::Files );
00071     for( i = 0, n = files.count(); i < n; ++i ){
00072         layout = DzFileIO::getBaseFileName( files[i] );
00073         if( layout != "user" )
00074             comboBox_layout->insertItem( layout );
00075     }
00076 
00077     comboBox_style_activated("Blue Ice");
00078     comboBox_style->setCurrentText("Blue Ice");
00079     comboBox_layout_activated("Classic");
00080     comboBox_layout->setCurrentText("Classic");
00081 }
00082 
00083 void DzSetupWizard::comboBox_style_activated(const QString &item)
00084 {
00085     QString filename = dzApp->getResourcesPath() + "/style/" + item + ".style";
00086 
00087     DzStyleDefinition   styleDef( filename );
00088     QImage              img = styleDef.getIcon();
00089     img = img.smoothScale(480, 360);
00090     pixmapLabel_thumbnail_style->setPaletteBackgroundPixmap( QPixmap( img ) );
00091 }
00092 
00093 void DzSetupWizard::comboBox_layout_activated(const QString &item)
00094 {
00095     QImage img( dzApp->getResourcesPath() + "/layouts/" + item + ".png" );
00096     img = img.smoothScale(480, 360);
00097     
00098     pixmapLabel_thumbnail_layout->setPaletteBackgroundPixmap( QPixmap( img ) );
00099 }
